analysis: The project currently has a basic structure for a website about black holes. The HTML file needs to be completed with sections related to black holes, including interactive planets and animated slides. The CSS file should be enhanced with a dark, cosmic theme featuring animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file requires fixing syntax errors and adding functionality for mobile menu toggles, event listeners for buttons, and smooth transitions. The theme should focus on black holes, incorporating animated objects and slides to create an engaging user experience.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to include sections about black holes, interactive planets, and animated slides with proper event handlers and styling.
Enhance the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, glowing elements, and a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function, implement mobile menu toggle functionality with smooth transitions, add event listeners for buttons, and ensure all functions are properly implemented.
